about_the_game:
The Skullgirls Original Soundtrack is now available for purchase!

Containing 44 tracks (including Annie's new theme "The Stars and Stage Are Set"), this album features music by distinguished composer Michiru Yamane (Castlevania: Symphony of the Night), award-winning composer Vincent Diamante (Flower, Sky), plus composers Blaine McGurty and Brenton Kossak.

Combining her trademark haunting, gothic melodies with jazz influences, Michiru Yamane’s soundtrack perfectly sets the mood for the “dark deco” world of Skullgirls.

NOTE: This soundtrack will be updated with new Character tracks for FREE as they become available. See the Skullgirls Season 1 Pass for more details!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 235 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2 GB available space
